'''Chenyu Brew''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe for Chenyu Brew can be purchased from [[Lianfang]] for {{Item|Mora|x=1,250}}.

Depending on the quality, Chenyu Brew restores '''8'''/'''9'''/'''10'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''210'''/'''260'''/'''300''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
